reviewText: This is a good DVD and it is interesting to see Viktoriya do different types of dance.  I do feel it was a little lackluster on the performances though.  She is dancing for the camera instead of an audience which, I think, makes a big difference.  I had to buy it since I knew she died in 2010. To see great performances by her get "Temptation of Bellydance".  This is a much better representation of her work.
